body.name: Evermagin C Shaped End Table with Charging Station, Small Couch Side Table with Storage Bag, Power Outlet and USB, Sturdy Slide Under Sofa Table with Metal Frame for Living Room & Bedroom,Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 28 mins
features: 【C-Shape Design】C structure allows you to slide this small end table under a chair, sofa or other furniture, offer you convenient access to your laptop for home office. Ideal for adding an extra table lamp, eating a meal while watching TV, or serve as a desk in a pinch.

【Convenient Charging】 This bedside table with storage bag comes equipped with 2 easily accessible AC power outlets and 2 USB ports. Its 4.9-foot long power cord provides ample charging space for your electronic devices.

【Versatile Uses】The side table can be used as an end table, couch table, TV tray table, laptop table or nightstand and meets your needs for daily use. The top shelf provides convenient space for placing laptop, books, magazines, coffee, snacks, a meal or other items.

【Sturdy & Durable】With 4 height adjustable plastic feet, the slim couch table can be used on uneven floors or carpets to increase the stability of the little table. Composed of waterproof particleboard and quality square steel tube frame and load capacity up to 22 lbs.

【Extra Storage Pocket】Provides enough display and storage space. One large bag of 14.3"*9.5" for tablet, newspapers and magazines, three small cloth bags for temporary storage of remote control, mobile phone and charger without taking up too much room space.

【Easy to Assemble & Move】Simple product construction, numbered parts and easy-to-follow instructions allow you to effortlessly assemble this sofa side table within 15 minutes with tools in the package. The lightweight design allow the snack table to be moved around.

【Fit Small Spaces】Sized at 16”L x 10”W x 28”H, easily fits the gaps between your couches or the tight spots beside your bed. For homes without more space for traditional nightstands and sofa side tables, this c table with charging port is certainly the excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little table
reviews.reviewText: This table is easy to assemble and is sturdy enough to hold my laptop and cooling fan. It has power strip and USB ports.My only complaint is that the power cord is not very long, maybe about four feet and so does not reach across under my couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reordered two more!
reviews.reviewText: This product was so well built, designed, eye appealing & user friendly my wife ordered a couple more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little table!
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I got this little table, it holds my drinks and my dinner. Right now it's holding a small bouquet of Christmas flowers. I love that the back of the table has two plug-in units and a couple of USB ports. I'm using all four. I would attach a photo but this review just isn't letting me do that..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great with our new sofa. Didn’t install the rubber feet due to proximity of of sofa and the floor. Power outlet works as intended. Easy to build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One of the table pegs wouldn't screw in
reviews.reviewText: This table is great. I use it for my everyday work and it gives me no issues. It also was easy to build and setup, adding to the overall greatness of this product. However, I will have to knock off a star as one of the pegs that go under the table, would not screw in. Leading to a wobbly table. In order to maintain the overall stability, I removed another peg on that was on the same side. This does make it's balance worse than it should be. I personally don't mind as the table doesn't move around much and mainly stays in the same spot. But it is still something to keep in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neat little c-table that takes up very little room.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my husband as he really needed a small table to put his cup or laptop while in his recliner. He didn't want an actual side table since that takes up room. This was perfect for that reason.He set it up in less than 20 minutes and had no issues at all. The instructions are clear and easy to follow, and all the parts were accounted for.Once built, this little table looks very nice while being unobtrusive. It's easy to move away from the chair, and fits perfectly over the arm rest when he wants to use it.It is a wee bit wobbly on the carpet which is to be expected. I have a feeling it would be more stable on a hard floor. Just in case out tornado toddler bumps it, we use rubber coasters to keep his coffee from spilling or sliding.The table seems strong and has no problem holding his laptop. I love how this one has outlets. I have a larger c-table in a similar color that I wish had outlets too. Although mine is more stable on the carpet, but it is heavier and twice the size so has more stability.Overall this looks very nice, is good quality and works well for what we use it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must-have for lazy people like me
reviews.reviewText: This little thing is so convenient. I keep it next to my spot on the couch and I no longer have to get up as much because my little table is right there holding all my stuff and barely taking up any space. I love that I can easily reach and access the charging ports. It’s the best feature. I can plug in my nail salon stuff, light, apple devices, fan, glue gun, and other endless possibilities. It’s sturdy for a little table and was really easy to assemble. This is a must-have little table and it definitely gets 5 stars from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and easily adjusted
reviews.reviewText: The c-shaped bottom frame, rather than the closed square bottom frame was really important to me because the couch I plan to use this with has really wide feet. I have another table similar to this, but to use it at that couch, I had to lift the couch and have to put the feet inside of the square - so I can't move the table much. With this c-shaped bottom frame, I can reposition it easily as needed. I can use it as a side table, or I can very easily move it to be in front of me.I don't care for the side pockets and was happy to see that they are detachable. A flat plug would have been much more versatile than a standard plug. While the power cord was long enough for me, the location of the outlet it would go to is in a tight spot, so the protrusion of a standard plug is annoying. Instead, I use short surge protector with a flat plug. The two power outlets along with two USB outlets is generous given the size of the table. I do wish that they, themselves, were surge protectors.I removed the 4 feet because I didn't like the little bit of height that it added and the carpeted floor it's on is level enough for me not to have to deal with wobbling.I was able to put it together easily and it seems sturdy. I will be buying another to replace the other one I'd been using. This one is so much better.
